description: The round payoff this round was 92. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of 23.
Kate received a higher payoff than John in this round

The game creates a prisoner's dilemma-like situation where mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) maximizes total payoff, but there's incentive to defect (choose option 2) if you think the other player will choose option 1
If John had also chosen option 2, both would have received less than if both had chosen option 1
For future rounds, John might consider either matching Kate's strategy or trying to establish cooperation through consistent option 1 choices
